3 things before we start...

  1. This is the mockup stage

    This site contains flat images of what your new website will look like on mobile and desktop devices. Nothing is clickable yet.

  2. I need your feedback!

    Please be honest. It's my top priority that you love your new website, so your input is mandatory for its success. Back-and-forths are part of the process.

  3. Remember the objectives

    Our shared objective is a site that works. It completes your goals, whether that's signups or product sold. Regardless, the site will adhere to industry principles and standards.
